carpet.rule.thunderRitual.desc: Throwing a stack of lightning rods into the void causes 10 minutes of thunder
carpet.rule.traderRitual.desc: Throwing 16 emerald blocks into the void spawns a wandering trader directly above
carpet.rule.fastMinecarts.desc: Gives minecarts a speed multiplier when on top of configured block(s)
carpet.rule.hardcodedItemRNG.desc: Allows you to set the random velocity of items
carpet.rule.hardcodedDispenserItemRNG.de: Allows you to set the random velocity of items that are dispensed
carpet.rule.movableReinforcedDeepslate.d: Makes reinforced deepslate blocks movable by piston
